snippet: The drugmaker GlaxoSmithKline is shutting down a North Carolina plant that produces inhaled medications after discovering the bacteria that causes Legionnaires’ disease.
lead_paragraph: The drugmaker GlaxoSmithKline is shutting down a North Carolina plant that produces inhaled medications after discovering the bacteria that causes Legionnaires’ disease.

headline.main: Glaxosmithkline Plant Closes After Legionnaires’ Discovery
headline.print_headline: Glaxosmithkline Plant Closes After Legionnaires’ Discovery
